citations.narrative:
There were several small pieces of asphalt-type roofing shingles and several wooden boards noted inside the large
outdoor domestic hoofstock, llama, and alpaca pen (at least one board had the pointed end of a 2-3" nail/screw coming
through that was sticking straight upwards).
Per this Section, premises shall be kept clean to facilitate the prescribed husbandry practices and to protect the animals
from injury, and any trash on the premises shall be cleared as necessary to protect the health of the animals. These items
need to be removed from the pen and the animal pens should be regularly checked for the presence of discarded
materials and/or trash. Correct by 5/1/23.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
There were several small pieces of asphalt-type roofing shingles and several wooden boards noted inside the large 
outdoor domestic hoofstock, llama, and alpaca pen (at least one board had the pointed end of a 2-3" nail/screw coming 
through that was sticking straight upwards).  
 
Per this Section, premises shall be kept clean to facilitate the prescribed husbandry practices and to protect the animals 
from injury, and any trash on the premises shall be cleared as necessary to protect the health of the animals. These items 
need to be removed from the pen and the animal pens should be regularly checked for the presence of discarded 
materials and/or trash. Correct by 5/1/23. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.  
 
*END OF REPORT* 
 
 n
